Freelance makeup, hair  and photo styling for film and Photo

My experience in film and photo range from commercial, TV, network broadcast, advertising, major motion picture and entertainment. Skills include; HD makeup,special effects, hair styling, tattoo coverage, fashion, natural and clean, and paramedical makeup.  Here is a list of some recent clients; Pantene, Nike, Adidas, Under Armour, Wilson golf, PetSmart, Scottsdale Convention & Visitors Bureau, Gillette, Dickinson witch Haze and Lowes. Other top clients include such as Clairol, Suave, Vogue, Vogue Italia, Rolling Stone magazine, MTV,!, CNN, ESPN, Disney Disney and Universal Studios.Please see my website for more credits. www.dorirandall.com

Dori is an amazing artist whose fine hand creates beautiful images for film, TV and still photo shoots. She has a great eye for design and has an wonderful skill to make anyone look like a movie star and a movie star look like anyone. Her work is above par and working with her is rewarding as she is a very generous co-worker with a heart of gold.

summary: Hi and welcome!  For more than 20 years I have been a freelance makeup artist & hairstylist for the production industry.  My experience in film and photo range from commercial, TV, network broadcast, advertising, major motion picture and entertainment.What do you get when working with me??  You get a seasoned professional  in HD makeup, special effects, hair styling, tattoo coverage, commercial, fashion, natural and clean, paramedical makeup,  "on set"  photo styling, and excellent set etiquette!  I like to think of myself as an additional set of eyes that really help with photo retouching, before we commit the project to print... rather than after!Licensed cosmetologist .  a member of local 706 . Arizona production Association.www.dorirandall.comhttps://www.azproduction.com/listings/production-personnel/makeup-artists
